alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 21 at 2:40PM CDT until July 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory on Friday, heat index values up to 100 expected. For the Heat Advisory on Saturday, heat index values up to 104 expected. * WHERE...Chase, Hayes and Frontier Counties. * WHEN...The Heat Advisory on Friday is in effect from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/. The Heat Advisory on Saturday is in effect from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.
